name: MasteringPluralNouns
0:
”Alexa, open Mastering Plural Nouns”
”Start the game”
”Tell me about plurals”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mastering plural nouns
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Mastering Plural Nouns is a quiz game that tests a user’s ability to pluralize English nouns. The game involves choosing from the given options the correct plural form of a singular word. It’s a great way to memorize plurals, especially that of irregular nouns that defy standard rules. Players can surprise themselves each day by learning to pluralize nouns rolled out from an extensive repository of questions. To ensure reinforcement learning, answers are backed with suitable explanations stating the relevant rules. Considering beginners, the game also contains a demo outlining the basic rules applied to form plurals with examples. With regular practice comes the ability to maturely and coherently communicate your ideas in English and that forms the main objective of this ESL educational skill. 
Once you’ve enabled the skill, just say Alexa, open Mastering Plural Nouns, and use the following commands:

To play the game, say “Start the game”

To get a demo on the rules to form plurals, say “Tell me about plurals”

To pass a question, say “skip”.

To listen to the question again, say “repeat”. 

To erase your progress and start fresh, say “reset the game”.

To understand the rules of the game, say “help”.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
